title: Swap two numbers description: Write a program to swap two numbers image: hero.png tags:

  • python
  • c contributors:
  • johnelbacani

Write a program to swap two numbers

Input:  a=10 b=20
Output: a=20 b=10

# define variables
a = 10
b = 20

# swap numbers
c = a
a = b
b = c

# print result
print(a, b)

#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int a, b;
    printf("Enter the value of a : ");
    scanf("%d", &a);
    printf("Enter the value of b : ");
    scanf("%d", &b);
    int temp = a;
    a = b;
    b = temp;
    printf("\nOutput: a = %d , b = %d\n", a, b);
    return 0;
}

// Write a program to swap two numbers

#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int a, b;
    printf("Enter the value of a : ");
    scanf("%d", &a);
    printf("Enter the value of b : ");
    scanf("%d", &b);
    int temp = a;
    a = b;
    b = temp;
    printf("\nOutput: a = %d , b = %d\n", a, b);
    return 0;
}


# Write a program to swap two numbers.
# define variables
a = 10
b = 20

# swap numbers
c = a
a = b
b = c

# print result
print(a, b)
